description.summary: I enjoy using my obsessive attention to detail, my unequivocal love for making things, and my mission-driven work ethic to literally change the world. That's why Iâ€™m excited to make a big impact at a high growth company.

bio.info: I have been working in Front End Development Since 2014, started carrer as an part of my passion toward web development, i was always enthustict about coding and front end world, so started enrolling to online courses and bootcamps to make Web Develpoment as my carrer. I merge my passion for coding and user experince with technical knoledge to create a cool digit experince.

I have worked with many big consulatancy companies to start-ups. Actively mentors intermediate and junior developers and provide guidance to the team members to achieve highest levels of quality and productivity and have worked with a good number of successful development team I wanted to be a part of an esteemed organization wherein I can contribute to the growth of the company, thus improving my knowledge through dedication and hard work.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
